overview: Continuing in Sweetheart's tradition of selecting the biggest names in adult lesbian entertainment, we've highlighted the incomparable Asa Akira for our latest Loves Girls series. Asa's passion and commitment to bearing you body and soul on camera is never greater than in these four scenes with Asa's friends and co-workers. Featuring Jayden Cole, Celeste Star, Katsuni, and London Keyes, each girl takes Asa on a different adventure in feminine romance. Always with real sex and real orgasms and shot in top quality HD, this is sure to be a number one for any Asa Akira fan. Directed by James Avalon.
title: Asa Loves Girls
